dmca.title: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: David Caplan [mailto:dcaplan@kmwlaw.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 01, 2006 5:46 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
Subject: UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE


David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
9720 Wilshire Blvd., Penthouse Suite
Beverly Hills, CA 90212
(310) 248-3830
Fax:  (310) 860-0363

November 1, 2006

VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL 

Leslie Sparks
c/o Network Solutions
P.O. Box 447
Herndon, VA 20172

customerservice@networksolutions.com; abuse@ev1servers.net;
admin@ev1.net

        Re:         UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
        http://www.adultfanclubs.net

Dear Ms. Sparks:

        This letter is being written to you on behalf of our client
Natasha Yi.  Ms. Yi is the owner of rights of publicity and privacy in
her name and image. 

        Notwithstanding Ms. Yi's rights, it has come to our attention
that your web site located at
"http://www.adultfanclubs.net/pseek/Adults_Only/Celebrities/Centerfolds/
Y/Yi,044_Natasha/," links unauthorized reproductions of Ms. Yi's image.
The distribution of these images, as well as the use of Ms. Yi's name in
metatags on your web site and/or your use of Ms. Yi's name to increase
traffic to your web site, violates Ms. Yi's rights of publicity and
privacy.  Further, based on the fact that some of the images on the
above-referenced web site appear to have been illegally copied from
copyrighted photographs, this web site may also infringe the rights of
various copyright owners.

        We hereby demand that you and all those who have acted in
concert with you immediately cease any copying, transmission, or other
utilization of Ms. Yi's name and image, and that you delete from your
site or other sites operated by you all unauthorized depictions of Ms.
Yi.  Should you not immediately do so, Ms. Yi expressly reserves all of
her rights to file a lawsuit against you to obtain both damages for all
past acts of infringement and an injunction to prevent any future
infringement.

        If we do not receive your written confirmation before the close
of business on November 15, 2006, that you have complied with these
demands, we will advise Ms. Yi to take such action against you as she
may deem appropriate.

        This letter is not a complete statement of Natasha Yi's rights
in connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes
an express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies or defenses of
Natasha Yi in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly
reserved.


Very truly yours,
/s/
David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
